description: This is an interdisciplinary module and it will adopt a heuristic approach to celestial dynamics. Mathematics will be introduced only when necessary. Participants will also be enthused with the historical and philosophical development of celestial adventures discussed. Topics covered include elements of Newton and Keplerâ€™s Laws, Planetary Orbits and Rocketry, Apollo program, Saturn V & SpaceX Boosters.
title: Celestial Exploration
